Generation VIII.Sword: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
Generation VIII.Shield: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 7 , Route 9 , Giant's Mirror , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 7 , Route 9 , Giant's Mirror , Lake of Outrage Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
